description: Durpyblins are so dumb, they need help from the also dumb Dodoblins to get anything done! That's a lot of dumb!
tooltip: Durpyblins are so dumb, they need help from the also dumb Dodoblins to get anything done! That's a lot of dumb! (Several Dodoblin Squaddies will now spawn with Durpyblin Defenders)
